newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Taiwan to issue Aug 16-31 reformate buy tender.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan to issue Aug 16-31 reformate buy tender.

text.p: Taiwan's state-owned Chinese Petroleum Corp (CPC) will issue a tender on Wednesday to buy August 16-31 arrival reformate, a company official said on Tuesday.
The tender which seeks 250,000 barrels of 95-octane unleaded reformate delivered to Keelung, Kaohsiung, Shalung or Taichung, closes July 9 and is valid for two days.
CPC's last tender, for August 1-10 arrival, awarded two cargoes to a Dutch trader at around $24.60-$24.76 per barrel, cost-and-freight, sources said.
